thread.title: BRIEF-IBM Says To Reduce Share Count By About 2 Percent Annually Through Share Buybacks In Longer Term Model

title: BRIEF-IBM Says To Reduce Share Count By About 2 Percent Annually Through Share Buybacks In Longer Term Model
text: Market News March 8, 2018 / 4:17 PM / Updated 37 minutes ago BRIEF-IBM Says To Reduce Share Count By About 2 Percent Annually Through Share Buybacks In Longer Term Model Reuters Staff March 8 (Reuters) - International Business Machines Corp : * IBM SAYS LONGER-TERM FINANCIAL MODEL POSITIONED FOR LOW SINGLE-DIGIT REVENUE GROWTH - SEC FILING * IBM SAYS LONGER-TERM FINANCIAL MODEL POSITIONED FOR HIGH SINGLE-DIGIT EPS GROWTH * IBM SAYS WILL REDUCE SHARE COUNT BY ABOUT 2 PERCENT ANNUALLY THROUGH SHARE BUYBACKS IN LONGER TERM MODEL Source text: ( bit.ly/2FqIpuN ) Further company coverage:
